committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize the payment of increased annuities to secretaries of justices and judges of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of specified increased annuities to secretaries of justices and judges of the United States. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331, 8334(c), 8339(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize the payment of increased annuities to secretaries of justices and judges of the United States.
